column5: Gorgeous luxury 2/2 cabin on 23 gated acres with a pool! Sleeps 6. King in Master, 2 Queens in upper bedroom, 2 living areas, 2 bathrooms with walk-in showers, fully equipped kitchen, luxury linens, Denver Mattresses, Down comforters, cable, internet, Wii game system and games, bbq, horseshoe pit, lighted trees, covered parking, 1.5 miles to the Guadalupe River, and Canyon Lake. Star gazing and hiking.
